txt.en:
'I do not believe in long farewells. You have little time to delay. You must ride swiftly, for you have a long journey ahead of you.'

<rgb=#FF0000>You will automatically travel to Talan Haldir in Lothlórien when you accept this quest.</rgb>
'You long to see the Lady Galadriel? I would not keep you from her, [placeholder], but I fear things are not so simple this time.'
'I am ready! Let us ride for the land of the Elf-queen!'
'Go with courage! Go with haste! And do not fear the darkness!'
Nona has said her farewells to Suvulch, and now it is time for you to ride with all haste to Lothlórien.
Travel to Lothlórien and speak with Haldir on his flet outside the borders
Haldir is on a flet outside Lothlórien.\n\nYou should speak to Haldir to obtain permission to travel with Nona into Lothlórien.
